@WebBruce what did you use to learn php that fast and how many hours a day did you spend?

@JAnderson PHP for dummies and tutorials online, understand the signup section, security and sessions were the largest areas.  Keep in mind though I've taken a database and java class which helps to understand basics.  I spent about 6 days and 5-6hrs/day on it
